titleStmt.title: The interpretation of dreams digested into five books by that ancient and excellent philosopher, Artimedorus / compiled by him in Greek, and translated afterwards into the Latine, the Italian, the French, and Spanish tongues, and now more exactly rendered into English ...
Oneirocritica. English
titleStmt.author: Artemidorus, Daldianus.
Valerius Maximus.
R. W. (Robert Wood)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
Translator's preface, book 1, and dedication, book 2, signed: R.W. [i.e. Robert Wood].
"An epitome out of Valerius Maximus, concerning dreams": p. 163-175.
